name: Sandlife
description:
Sandlife is a construction game that develops people's creativity, which is based on a construction system with blocks, which are capable of interacting in the world. In Sandlife, you can build with a wide variety of blocks and save and load your worlds so you never lose your progress. The game will have more features and functionalities in the future. Do you dare to try it?
